memberOrga: We are growing our membership after launching in Brussels in January 2017. Members include; Lexmark Inc, IBM, Autocraft, Volvo, SKF, Panalpina, syncreon, COCIR, ETIRA, FIRM, and a number of SME members including Aspire, APD, ARP (Netherlands) Slaters Electrical and GIT
